meanings.definition: Suitable for giving as a gift.
meanings.sent1: The giftables box was beautifully wrapped in shiny paper.
meanings.sent2: She picked out the giftables items for her friend's birthday present.
meanings.sent3: The giftables mug made everyone smile with its cute design.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a giftables treasure, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The giftables necklace sparkled under the lights, catching everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: Items that are appropriate for giving as gifts.
meanings.sent1: The store had a wide selection of giftables for every occasion.
meanings.sent2: She bought a few giftables to have on hand for unexpected celebrations.
meanings.sent3: The giftables aisle was always crowded with shoppers looking for presents.
meanings.sent4: His collection of giftables was like a mini gift shop in his room.
meanings.sent5: The giftables section of the store was filled with colorful and unique items.
